remarks: The final Hilbert space constructed from a Hilbert lattice ` K ` and an arbitrary hyperplane ` W ` in ` K ` .  (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2015.)
statement:

hlhilset.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
hlhilset.e $e |- E = ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) $.

hlhilset.i $e |- ., = ( x e. V , y e. V |-> ( ( S ` y ) ` x ) ) $.
hlhilset.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
